answers.answer: Hi,Ive had type 1 for 31 yrs and for me Ive found the best person to talk to regarding this would be a nutritionist,through your local hospital or your dr. can send you to.Some even have classes/meetings you can go to .

question: im 16 and have only had diabetes a few years i am finding things really difficult now ! , what foods can i eat that will help me lose weight and keep my blood sugar good ??
title: help with type one diabtes
